fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: Activity identifier (using the 360Giving identifier format)
fields.name: id

fields.title: Title
fields.description: A title for this grant activity
fields.name: title

fields.title: Description
fields.description: A short description of this grant activity
fields.name: description

fields.title: Web Address
fields.description: A url for further information on this grant. This could point to the website of the recipient organisation, or might link to further details on the funder website.
fields.name: url

fields.description: The currency, using a three-digit currency code from [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217)
fields.title: Currency
fields.name: currency

fields.title: Planned Dates:Start Date
fields.description:
Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. If only a month or day are not available, these may be omitted.

This field records the start date of some event, activity or moment in the lifetime of a grant. At a minimum events/activities must have a start date.
fields.name: plannedDates[]/startDate

fields.title: Planned Dates:End Date
fields.description:
Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. If only a month or day are not available, these may be omitted.

Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in days) or an end date.
fields.name: plannedDates[]/endDate

fields.title: Planned Dates:Duration (months)
fields.description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in days) or an end date.
fields.name: plannedDates[]/duration

fields.title: Amount Applied For
fields.description: Total amount applied for. Include numbers only. DO NOT include any currency symbols such as £ or $. If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the application transactions for this grant.
fields.name: amountAppliedFor

fields.title: Amount Awarded
fields.description: Total amount awarded (should be the same as the sum of any award transactions). DO NOT include any currency symbols such as £ or $. If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the award transactions for this grant.
fields.name: amountAwarded

fields.title: Amount Disbursed
fields.description: Total amount disbursed (paid) to this grantee when this record was last updated. DO NOT include any currency symbols such as £ or $. If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the disbursement transactions for this grant.
fields.name: amountDisbursed

fields.title: Award Date:Start Date
fields.description:
Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. If only a month or day are not available, these may be omitted.

This field records the start date of some event, activity or moment in the lifetime of a grant. At a minimum events/activities must have a start date.
fields.name: awardDate[]/startDate

fields.title: Recipient Org:Identifier
fields.description: An organisation identifier, following the Organisation ID standard.
fields.name: recipientOrganization[]/id

fields.title: Recipient Org:Name
fields.description: Organisation name
fields.name: recipientOrganization[]/name

fields.title: Recipient Org:Charity Number
fields.description: Registered charity number, if applicable.
fields.name: recipientOrganization[]/charityNumber

fields.title: Recipient Org:Company Number
fields.description: Registered UK company number, if applicable.
fields.name: recipientOrganization[]/companyNumber

fields.title: Recipient Org:Street Address
fields.description: Building number and street name.
fields.name: recipientOrganization[]/streetAddress

fields.title: Recipient Org:City
fields.description: City or town.
fields.name: recipientOrganization[]/addressLocality

fields.title: Recipient Org:Postal Code
fields.description: Postal code (please try and provide a post code whenever possible)
fields.name: recipientOrganization[]/postalCode

fields.title: Beneficiary Location:Name
fields.description: A name for this location.
fields.name: beneficiaryLocation[]/name

fields.title: Beneficiary Location:Country Code
fields.description: The ISO Country Code of the location of this activity.
fields.name: beneficiaryLocation[]/countryCode

fields.title: Beneficiary Location:Lat-Long
fields.description: Enter a latitude and longitude, separated by a comma.
fields.name: beneficiaryLocation[]/point

fields.title: Funding Org:Identifier
fields.description: An organisation identifier, following the Organisation ID standard.
fields.name: fundingOrganization[]/id

fields.title: Funding Org:Name
fields.description: Organisation name
fields.name: fundingOrganization[]/name

fields.description: Was this grant made as the result of an open call for applications? Values should be 'Yes' or 'No'
fields.title: From an open call?
fields.name: fromOpenCall

fields.title: Grant Programme:Code
fields.description: An identifier for this grant programme.
fields.name: grantProgramme[]/code

fields.title: Grant Programme:Title
fields.description: The title of this grant programme.
fields.name: grantProgramme[]/title

fields.title: Grant Programme:URL
fields.description: A web link to more details of this grant programme.
fields.name: grantProgramme[]/url

fields.title: Last modified
fields.description: The date when information on this grant was last updated
fields.name: dateModified

fields.title: Data Source
fields.description: A web link pointing to the source of this data. This may be an original 360Giving data file, a file from which the data was converted, or an organisation website.
fields.name: dataSource
